content.rendered:
Directed by Shoojit Sircar

Written by Shubhendu Bhattacharya. Ritesh Shah

Star Vicky Kaushal (Udham Singh). Shaun Scott (Michael O’Dwyer). Stephen Hogan (Detective Inspector Swain). Amol Parashar (Bhagat Singh). Banita Sandhu (Reshma). Kirsty Averton (Eileen Palmer). Andrew Havill (General Reginald Dyer). Sam Redford (Detective Deighton). Albrecht Zander (Junior Detective). Tim Berrington (John Hutchison). Mark Lingwood (Superintendent Sands). Simon Weir (King George VI). Tim Hudson (Winston Churchill). Richard Glover (Public Prosecutor). Nicholas Gecks (Justice Atkinson). Ritesh Shah (Koppikar). Jogi Mallang (Surat Ali). Kuljeet Singh (Johal). Tushar Sheetal Singhal (Informer to Udham Singh). Sarfaraz Alam Safu (Interpreter at Scotland Yard). Andrey Tolshin (Main Government Spokesperson). Sergei Mazurenko (Senior Minister). Manas Tiwari (Nihal Singh). Boris Khasanov (Pearson (Gun Dealer)). Sergei Shokolov (ADC at Lahore). Amarjeet Singh (S.P. Patiala). Harprit Singh Sarkariya (Nand Singh). Andrey Blagoslovenski (Passport Officer (as Andrey Blagoslovensky)). Deanna Dezmari (Witness at Caxton Hall). Mariya Odegova (Witness at Caxton Hall). Marina Skulskaia (Journalist). Aleksei Sinitsyn (Journalist). Aleksandr Ganelin (Journalist). Dmitrii Murashev (Journalist). Aleksandr Dorokhin (Journalist). Aleksandr Kirichek (Journalist). Graczyk Bohdan Robert (Scotland Yard Detective). Tatiana Nikitina-Verkhovskaia (Michael O’Dwyer’s Wife (as Tatiana Nikitina Verkhovskaia)). Lyubov Firsova (Russian Neighbour (as Liubov Firsova)). Nina Zhirnakova (Old Lady (as Nina Zhernakova)). Artur Kharitonenko (Factory Supervisor). Dmitrii Seferov (Protestor). Nikolay Serdtsev (Man Who Sells Gun In Bar). Vladimir Genenraykh (Policeman at Dover Port (as Vladimir Genenraikh)). Oleg Levakov (Russian Politburo). Iuliia Beshchuk (Russian Translator). Vladmir Krylov (Policeman). Ruslan Katsagadzhiev (Jail Official). Sergey Kozik (Warden (as Sergei Kozik)). Tess Nikolas (Girl at Flea Market). Katerina Makarskaia (Girl at Flea Market). Sergey Korenkov (Asst. to Government Spokesperson). Valerii Sidorenko (Official at Desk). Larsia Ivitskaia (Official at Desk). Nikita Fediakhin (IRA Boy Shot Dead). Irina Vladmirskaia (Mother of IRA Boy Who Gets Shot). Iaroslava Maksimenko (Woman With A Child). Dmitrii Sultanov (IRA Member). Mikhail Poliakov (IRA Member). Sergey Shishkin (Police Officer). Aleksey Korshunov (Police Officer at the Stairs (as Aleksei Korshunov)). Mikhail Sakulin (Police Officer at Port). Elena Markovskaia (Woman at the Cemetery). Avik Mukhopadhayay (Abir Mukherjee). Rakhi Menon (Rihanna Siddiqui). Bhargav Oza (VK Menon). Mithil Lad (Factory Worker In London). Sayan Ghosh (Indian Revolutionary In London). Devaraj Baul (Indian Revolutionary In London). Parag Kalita (Indian Revolutionary In London). Shoaib (Indian Revolutionary In London). Bhagatjit Singh (Punjab Restaurant Owner). Ayan Saxena (Indian Who Signs Confession). Aleksandr Baranov (Hangman). Evgenii Boitsov (Drunk Man at Hyde Park). Aleksandr Pestov (Lord Zetland). Nikolai Pavliuk (Lord Lamington). Sanket Aggarwal (Rajguru). Jugraj Sona (Sukhdev). Mallika Sameer Shah (Bhagat Singh’s Associate). Abhishek Malik (Bhagat Singh’s Associate). Anmol Gupta (Bhagat Singh’s Associate). Ramandeep Kaur (Bhagat Singh’s Associate). Prabhdeep Singh (Bhagat Singh’s Associate). Tanveer (Bhagat Singh’s Associate). Gavy Shergill (Bhagat Singh’s Associate). Sukhanpreet Kaur (Bhagat Singh’s Associate). Kiranbeer Kaur (Bhagat Singh’s Associate). Robin Singh (Bhagat Singh’s Associate). Sukhman Kaur (Bhagat Singh’s Associate). Hayward Morse (Hunter Committee Member). Richard (Hunter Committee Member). Nickolay (Hunter Committee Member). Gary Tentoni (Hunter Committee Member). Sudhanva Deshpande (Hunter Committee Member). Harpreet Singh (CID Informer). Ranbir Sondh (Indian Policeman At Mianwali Jail). Manpreet Kaur (Udham Singh’s Relative In Village). Armen (British Officer Reporting To General Dyer). Dheer Hira (Injured Boy at Orphanage). Neeraj Kalra (Doctor At Hospital (Bagh))

Language Punjabi. Hindi. English. Russian

Producers Elena Belkova. Sheel Kumar. Ronnie Lahiri. Kumar Thakur. Lera Zingarevich

Production Kino Works. Rising Sun Films
